name: vscode-powertools
description: A set of useful and handy tools for Visual Studio Code.

apps.description: One or more apps to register.

oneOf.description: The path to the app script.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that app.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that app is for.

script.description: The path to the app script.

buttons.description: One or more buttons to register.

script.description: The path of the script to execute.

silent.description: Do not write result to output.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that button.

isRight.description: Display button on the right side or not.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that button is for.

commands.description: Defines one or more commands to register.

isRight.description: Display button on the right side or not.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that command.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that command is for.

script.description: The path to the script that should be executed.

events.description: One or more events to register.

script.description: The path to the script to execute.

exclude.description: One or more glob patterns of files to exclude.

files.description: One or more glob patterns of files to include.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that event.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that event is for.

jobs.description: One or more jobs to run.

script.description: The path of the script to execute.

oneOf.description: An action running a shell command.

silent.description: Do not write result to output.

isRight.description: Display button on the right side or not.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that job.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that job is for.

startup.description: One or more things to execute at startup.

oneOf.description: A command that is run as shell command.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that startup item.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that startup item is for.

silent.description: Do not write result to output.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that startup item.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that startup item is for.

script.description: The path to the script that should be executed.

values.description: Defines one or more values for the workspace.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that value.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that value is for.

file.description: The path to the file that should be loaded.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that value.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that value is for.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that value.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that value is for.

script.description: The path to the script to execute.

oneOf.description: A value from a shell command.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that value.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that value is for.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that value.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that value is for.

author: e.GO Digital GmbH, Aachen, Germany
